data.body: to aide in console cleanup - we should auto close tabs after a 5 second flicker warning on the tab.  if user clicks on it, the tab stays open.
data.description: to aide in console cleanup - we should auto close tabs after a 5 second flicker warning on the tab.  if user clicks on it, the tab stays open.
data.title: when process completes, flicker for the tab for 5 seconds and then close unless clicked on.
